messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: space exploration
messages.msgSnippet: it was snowing here this morning. Here for me is Tennessee. Three days ago it was 85 degrees Johanna Life is the ultimate learning experience! ... From:
messages.messageBody:
it was snowing here this morning. Here for me is Tennessee. Three days ago it was 85 degrees
 
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!
----- Original Message -----
From: vouget@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 17, 2001 12:45 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: space exploration

So sorry to send this so many times!!  DD was holding down the enter
key.

Sorry.  (And now I'm plugging up the list with my apology!)

Melanie in Indiana - It's snowing here, can you believe it????

messages.msgSnippet: did you stutter, I got this meaasage three times Johanna Life is the ultimate learning experience! ... From: vouget@hotmail.com To:
messages.messageBody:
did you stutter, I got this meaasage three times
 
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!
----- Original Message -----
From: vouget@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 17, 2001 9:23 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] space exploration

DS is obsessed with the solar system and space.  I was wondering if
anyone could recommend a good DVD (we don't have a VCR) - something
like "Tour of the Planets" or some such with real footage of the
video cameras on the space probes, etc.  He thought that the moon
exploration stuff we saw was fascinating.

Thanks

Melanie in Indiana
